title: Course on Strengthening Language Analysis Competencies Through Problem-Solving and Mathematical Reasoning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language analysis skills and understanding of mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: Training course in a BYOD environment to enhance language data analysis competencies through collaborative problem-solving and mathematical reasoning.

learning_goals: Learners can apply at least three mathematical approaches to solve complex language data problems.
In collaborative learning, learners propose diverse solutions and derive optimal strategies through peer feedback.
Learners quantitatively evaluate results by utilizing hypothesis-testing tools (e.g., statistical software) required for language pattern analysis.

resources: Data Analysis Tools (Google Sheets, Python Libraries)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
